ygData.subject: Re: Not appropriate
ygData.msgSnippet: ... member, i still think that the opinions put forth ford and greg are not fit to print.  this is an information source not a general gripe board.  please let
ygData.messageBody:
>From: kleit@...
>
>While i am not a member of the soerbaird nor have i ever met a
member, i still think that the opinions put forth ford and greg are
not fit to print. this is an information source not a general gripe
board. please let the rest of us make up out minds about people when
we meet them. i am a journalist in that other realm known as earth
and what you wrote would there be called libel. please be civil my
brothers. we are all here to have fun.
>Olczyk of Qeynos
>tarew marr
>
>---------------------------------------------------------------------

Well written friend. I also hold no affilliation to said guild nor
have I met any of it's members, yet I have found their information
and input on this board to be helpfull, fair, and honorable. From
what I have read in the way of complaints against these brothers and
sisters, most are petty and malicious. Personally, if someone
"slapped" me I would probably question the provoking party rather
than attacking outright, but that notwithstanding the comments made
sound more like a grudge for having lost a battle that the "slapper"
provoked rather than an unbiased evaluation of the guild or it's
members.

Zendarin
The Wandering Minstrel
